title: How to write an application to the principal for getting a school bus - Quora

response.answer_text: From XXXXX (your name here) YYYYY ( your address) ZZZZZ ( your pin code number) To The Principal YYYYY (your principal’s official address here) ZZZZZ ( his/her official pin code number) Subject: a request to use the school bus facilities Sir/Madam, I am at VII.of your school. It is my father who takes me to school and brings me back in his car and he does so on his way to his office and while returning from it. Yesterday, he got a transfer order and in a week, he will join duty in the office where he has been transferred to. Hence, I have other way but to avail myself of the school bus facilities. Please grant me permission to do so. I assure you that I pay the monthly bus fares promptly. Thanking you, Yours obediently ——————————————————————14- 03–2020 XXXX ( your name or signature here) ————————————— Chennai- 1 (Please note that you should write your class and section and not the ones that I have mentioned here and write the place where you live instead of Chennai which I have written here. Moreover, you can write your own reason for getting the school bus facilities.)
